Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Start A RG IA So sequence of three After IA start triage mandatory sequence TI TC So after IA we have TI TC After TC exclusive choice either CE or FBP Thats XOR XCEFBP

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: After that test we evaluate results If abnormal loop commences The patient must be reviewed by a Specialist Consultation SC After consultation an exclusive treatment choice TM or SPT Following the treatment ReDiagnostic Test RDT This loop repeats after the re diagnostic test if the results are still abnormal

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: loop structure would be something like seq SC XOR TM SPT RDT XOR CE FBP Not exactly Better The loop starts after initial test Actually loop triggers after evaluating initial test results abnormal then do SC exclusive treatment RDT after RDT evaluate again if still abnormal repeat So loop body likely is seq SC XOR TM SPT RDT

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Simplify Use loop to repeat the block seq SC XOR TM SPT RDT Then after loop exit go to advanced imaging and nutritional counseling concurrently then sequence of discharge steps then concurrency of final three

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Define triage seq TITC initial test XCE FBP loop body seq SC XTM SPT XFCE FBA overall structure initial steps until loop then concurrency AI NC then sequence FAS DDI then concurrency BL ICP MRF

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: thats not exactly correct because we used top level as parallel of multiple blocks but overall process is sequential not parallel So top level should be sequence Thus we can use to sequence blocks first block is the whole initial part Then second block is AINC Then third is FASD DI Then fourth is BLICP MRF

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Thus final representation sequence BlockInitial AINC FASDDI BLICP MRF Where BlockInitial itself is a nested expression it includes sequence of A RG IA TI TC XCE FBP loop etc
